64 AngleDetector::AngleDetector() : it_(nh_)
65 {
66  sub_ = it_.subscribe("image/binary",5,&AngleDetector::callback, this);
67  pub_ = nh_.advertise<remro_vision::RotorAngle>("motor/angle",1);
68 }
69 
70 void AngleDetector::callback(const sensor_msgs::ImageConstPtr& msg)
71 {
72  cv_bridge::CvImagePtr cv_ptr;
73  remro_vision::RotorAngle angle_msg;
74 
75  try
76  {
77  cv_ptr = cv_bridge::toCvCopy(msg,"mono8");
78  }
79  catch(cv_bridge::Exception& e)
80  {
81  ROS_ERROR("cv_bridge exception: %s\n",e.what());
82  }
83 
84  try
85  {
86  angle_msg.ANGLE = get_angle(cv_ptr->image);
87  //for debugging purposes:
88  ROS_INFO("%d\n",(int)angle_msg.ANGLE);
89 
90  pub_.publish(angle_msg);
91  }
92  catch(std::string e)
93  {
94  ROS_INFO("%s\n",e.c_str());
95  }
96 
97  return;
98 }
99 
100 float AngleDetector::get_angle(cv::Mat& bin)
101 {
102  if(!isBinary(bin))
103  throw std::string("Image container isn't binary");
104  cv::Moments m = moments(bin,true);
105  double a = m.mu20;
106  double b = m.mu11;
107  double c = m.mu02;
108 
109  double theta = atan2(b, a-c)/2.0;
110 
111  // return minus theta since the algorithm is counting
112  // the angle from -180Â° instead of 0
113  return static_cast<float>(-theta*180/PI);
114 }
115 
116 bool AngleDetector::isBinary(cv::Mat& m)
117 {
118  if(m.channels()>1)
119  return false;
120  int i,j;
121  for(i = 0; i < m.rows; i++)
122  for(j = 0; j < m.cols; j++)
123  if(!((m.at<uchar>(i,j) == 0) || (m.at<uchar>(i,j) == 255)))
124  return false;
125  return true;
126 }
